name: James T. Kirk
bio: Commanding officer of the U.S.S. Enterprise during the five-year mission.

name: Spock
station: First Officer & Science Officer, USS Enterprise (NCC-1701)
bio: Spock is a Commander Vulcan/Human serving as First Officer / Science Officer aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701). Associated with the original Enterprise lineage and its exploratory missions.

name: Leonard McCoy
bio: Leonard McCoy is a Commander Human serving as Chief Medical Officer aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701). Associated with the original Enterprise lineage and its exploratory missions.

name: Nyota Uhura
bio: Nyota Uhura is a Lieutenant Human serving as Communications Officer aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701). Associated with the original Enterprise lineage and its exploratory missions.

name: Montgomery Scott
bio: Montgomery Scott is a Lieutenant Commander Human serving as Chief Engineer aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701). Associated with the original Enterprise lineage and its exploratory missions.

name: Hikaru Sulu
bio: Hikaru Sulu is a Lieutenant Human serving as Helmsman aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701). Associated with the original Enterprise lineage and its exploratory missions.

name: Pavel Chekov
bio: Pavel Chekov is a Ensign Human serving as Navigator / Security aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701). Associated with the original Enterprise lineage and its exploratory missions.

name: Christine Chapel
bio: Christine Chapel is a Lieutenant Human serving as Medical Officer aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701). Associated with the original Enterprise lineage and its exploratory missions.

name: Janice Rand
bio: Janice Rand is a Yeoman Human serving as Captain's Yeoman aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701). Associated with the original Enterprise lineage and its exploratory missions.

name: Khan Noonien Singh
bio: Khan Noonien Singh is a Augment (Human) serving as Leader aboard SS Botany Bay.

name: Jean-Luc Picard
bio: Jean-Luc Picard is a Captain Human serving as Commanding Officer aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701-D). A key member of the Enterprise‑D era under Captain Picard.

name: William Riker
bio: William Riker is a Commander Human serving as First Officer aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701-D). A key member of the Enterprise‑D era under Captain Picard.

name: Data
bio: Data is a Lieutenant Commander Android (Soong-type) serving as Operations Officer aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701-D). A key member of the Enterprise‑D era under Captain Picard.

name: Geordi La Forge
bio: Geordi La Forge is a Lieutenant Commander Human serving as Chief Engineer aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701-D). A key member of the Enterprise‑D era under Captain Picard.

name: Worf
station: Security Chief / Tactical Officer, USS Enterprise (NCC-1701-D)
bio: Worf is a Lieutenant Klingon serving as Security/Tactical Officer aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701-D). A key member of the Enterprise‑D era under Captain Picard.

name: Beverly Crusher
bio: Beverly Crusher is a Commander Human serving as Chief Medical Officer aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701-D). A key member of the Enterprise‑D era under Captain Picard.

name: Deanna Troi
bio: Deanna Troi is a Commander Betazoid/Human serving as Ship's Counselor aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701-D). A key member of the Enterprise‑D era under Captain Picard.

name: Wesley Crusher
bio: Wesley Crusher is a Acting Ensign Human serving as Acting Ensign aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701-D). A key member of the Enterprise‑D era under Captain Picard.

name: Tasha Yar
bio: Tasha Yar is a Lieutenant Human serving as Chief of Security aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701-D). A key member of the Enterprise‑D era under Captain Picard.

name: Q
bio: Q is a Q serving as Omnipotent Entity aboard Q Continuum.

name: Kira Nerys
bio: Kira Nerys is a Major Bajoran serving as Bajoran Liaison / Executive Officer aboard Deep Space 9. Known for pivotal roles during Bajor’s post-occupation era and the Dominion War.

name: Odo
bio: Odo is a Constable Changeling serving as Chief of Security aboard Deep Space 9. Known for pivotal roles during Bajor’s post-occupation era and the Dominion War.

name: Jadzia Dax
bio: Jadzia Dax is a Lieutenant Commander Trill (Joined) serving as Science Officer aboard Deep Space 9. Known for pivotal roles during Bajor’s post-occupation era and the Dominion War.

name: Ezri Dax
bio: Ezri Dax is a Ensign Trill (Joined) serving as Counselor aboard Deep Space 9. Known for pivotal roles during Bajor’s post-occupation era and the Dominion War.

name: Julian Bashir
bio: Julian Bashir is a Lieutenant Human serving as Chief Medical Officer aboard Deep Space 9. Known for pivotal roles during Bajor’s post-occupation era and the Dominion War.

name: Miles O'Brien
bio: Miles O'Brien is a Chief Petty Officer Human serving as Chief of Operations aboard Deep Space 9. Known for pivotal roles during Bajor’s post-occupation era and the Dominion War.

name: Quark
bio: Quark is a Ferengi serving as Bar Owner aboard Promenade, Deep Space 9. Known for pivotal roles during Bajor’s post-occupation era and the Dominion War.

name: Gul Dukat
bio: Gul Dukat is a Gul Cardassian serving as Officer aboard Cardassian Central Command.

name: Weyoun
bio: Weyoun is a Vorta serving as Administrator/Diplomat aboard Dominion.

name: Martok
bio: Martok is a General Klingon serving as General/Chancellor aboard Klingon Defense Force.

name: Kathryn Janeway
bio: Captain who led Voyager's journey home from the Delta Quadrant.

name: Chakotay
bio: Chakotay is a Commander Human serving as First Officer aboard USS Voyager (NCC-74656). Part of the crew stranded in the Delta Quadrant and their years‑long journey home.

name: Tuvok
bio: Tuvok is a Lieutenant Commander Vulcan serving as Chief of Security/Tactical aboard USS Voyager (NCC-74656). Part of the crew stranded in the Delta Quadrant and their years‑long journey home.

name: Tom Paris
bio: Tom Paris is a Lieutenant Human serving as Helmsman aboard USS Voyager (NCC-74656). Part of the crew stranded in the Delta Quadrant and their years‑long journey home.

name: B'Elanna Torres
bio: B'Elanna Torres is a Lieutenant Human/Klingon serving as Chief Engineer aboard USS Voyager (NCC-74656). Part of the crew stranded in the Delta Quadrant and their years‑long journey home.

name: Harry Kim
bio: Harry Kim is a Ensign Human serving as Operations Officer aboard USS Voyager (NCC-74656). Part of the crew stranded in the Delta Quadrant and their years‑long journey home.

name: Seven of Nine
bio: Seven of Nine is a Human (ex-Borg) serving as Astrometrics / Systems Specialist aboard USS Voyager (NCC-74656). Part of the crew stranded in the Delta Quadrant and their years‑long journey home.

name: The Doctor
bio: The Doctor is a Hologram serving as Emergency Medical Hologram aboard USS Voyager (NCC-74656). Part of the crew stranded in the Delta Quadrant and their years‑long journey home.

name: Neelix
bio: Neelix is a Talaxian serving as Guide / Morale Officer aboard USS Voyager (NCC-74656). Part of the crew stranded in the Delta Quadrant and their years‑long journey home.

name: Kes
bio: Kes is a Ocampa serving as Medical Assistant / Crewman aboard USS Voyager (NCC-74656). Part of the crew stranded in the Delta Quadrant and their years‑long journey home.

name: Jonathan Archer
bio: Jonathan Archer is a Captain Human serving as Commanding Officer aboard Enterprise (NX-01). Served during humanity’s early deep‑space era aboard NX‑01.

name: T'Pol
bio: T'Pol is a Commander Vulcan serving as Science Officer / First Officer aboard Enterprise (NX-01). Served during humanity’s early deep‑space era aboard NX‑01.

name: Charles 'Trip' Tucker III
bio: Charles 'Trip' Tucker III is a Commander Human serving as Chief Engineer aboard Enterprise (NX-01). Served during humanity’s early deep‑space era aboard NX‑01.

name: Malcolm Reed
bio: Malcolm Reed is a Lieutenant Human serving as Armory Officer / Tactical aboard Enterprise (NX-01). Served during humanity’s early deep‑space era aboard NX‑01.

name: Travis Mayweather
bio: Travis Mayweather is a Ensign Human serving as Helmsman aboard Enterprise (NX-01). Served during humanity’s early deep‑space era aboard NX‑01.

name: Hoshi Sato
bio: Hoshi Sato is a Ensign Human serving as Communications Officer aboard Enterprise (NX-01). Served during humanity’s early deep‑space era aboard NX‑01.

name: Phlox
bio: Phlox is a Doctor Denobulan serving as Chief Medical Officer aboard Enterprise (NX-01). Served during humanity’s early deep‑space era aboard NX‑01.

name: Michael Burnham
bio: Human raised on Vulcan; key figure in the Discovery era.

name: Saru
bio: Saru is a Captain Kelpien serving as Executive/Command aboard USS Discovery (NCC-1031). Connected to the USS Discovery and its era‑defining missions.

name: Sylvia Tilly
bio: Sylvia Tilly is a Ensign Human serving as Operations aboard USS Discovery (NCC-1031). Connected to the USS Discovery and its era‑defining missions.

name: Paul Stamets
bio: Paul Stamets is a Lieutenant Commander Human serving as Spore Drive Lead / Astromycology aboard USS Discovery (NCC-1031). Connected to the USS Discovery and its era‑defining missions.

name: Philippa Georgiou
station: Commanding Officer, USS Shenzhou; Terran Emperor (mirror)
bio: Philippa Georgiou is a Captain Human serving as Commanding Officer aboard USS Shenzhou (NCC-1227).

name: Cleveland Booker
bio: Cleveland Booker is a Kwejian serving as Courier aboard Independent.

name: Cristobal Rios
bio: Cristobal Rios is a Captain Human serving as Captain aboard La Sirena. Active in the late‑24th/early‑25th century events surrounding Jean‑Luc Picard.

name: Raffi Musiker
bio: Raffi Musiker is a Commander Human serving as Operations/Intelligence aboard La Sirena. Active in the late‑24th/early‑25th century events surrounding Jean‑Luc Picard.

name: Elnor
bio: Elnor is a Romulan serving as Warrior-monk ally aboard La Sirena. Active in the late‑24th/early‑25th century events surrounding Jean‑Luc Picard.

name: Agnes Jurati
bio: Agnes Jurati is a Doctor Human serving as Cyberneticist aboard La Sirena. Active in the late‑24th/early‑25th century events surrounding Jean‑Luc Picard.

name: Soji Asha
bio: Soji Asha is a Android (Synth) serving as Researcher aboard Artifact (Borg Cube).

name: Laris
bio: Laris is a Romulan serving as Steward / Security aboard Château Picard.

name: Christopher Pike
bio: Christopher Pike is a Captain Human serving as Commanding Officer aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701). Associated with the original Enterprise lineage and its exploratory missions.

name: Una Chin-Riley
bio: Una Chin-Riley is a Commander Illyrian (genetically modified) serving as First Officer aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701). Associated with the original Enterprise lineage and its exploratory missions.

bio: La'an Noonien-Singh is a Lieutenant Human (Augment ancestry) serving as Chief of Security aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701). Associated with the original Enterprise lineage and its exploratory missions.

bio: Erica Ortegas is a Lieutenant Human serving as Helm Officer aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701). Associated with the original Enterprise lineage and its exploratory missions.

name: Joseph M'Benga
bio: Joseph M'Benga is a Doctor Human serving as Chief Medical Officer aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701). Associated with the original Enterprise lineage and its exploratory missions.

bio: Christine Chapel (SNW) is a Nurse Human serving as Nurse aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701). Associated with the original Enterprise lineage and its exploratory missions.

name: Spock (SNW)
bio: Spock (SNW) is a Lieutenant Vulcan/Human serving as Science Officer aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701). Associated with the original Enterprise lineage and its exploratory missions.

bio: Nyota Uhura (SNW) is a Cadet Human serving as Communications Specialist aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701). Associated with the original Enterprise lineage and its exploratory missions.

name: Pelia
bio: Pelia is a Commander Lanthanite serving as Chief Engineer aboard USS Enterprise (NCC-1701). Associated with the original Enterprise lineage and its exploratory missions.

name: Beckett Mariner
bio: Beckett Mariner is a Ensign Human serving as Junior Officer aboard USS Cerritos (NCC-75567). Featured among Starfleet’s junior officers handling second‑contact duties.

name: Brad Boimler
bio: Brad Boimler is a Ensign Human serving as Junior Officer aboard USS Cerritos (NCC-75567). Featured among Starfleet’s junior officers handling second‑contact duties.

bio: D'Vana Tendi is a Ensign Orion serving as Medical Trainee / Science aboard USS Cerritos (NCC-75567). Featured among Starfleet’s junior officers handling second‑contact duties.

name: Sam Rutherford
bio: Sam Rutherford is a Ensign Human (Cyborg) serving as Engineer aboard USS Cerritos (NCC-75567). Featured among Starfleet’s junior officers handling second‑contact duties.

name: Carol Freeman
bio: Carol Freeman is a Captain Human serving as Commanding Officer aboard USS Cerritos (NCC-75567). Featured among Starfleet’s junior officers handling second‑contact duties.

name: Jack Ransom
bio: Jack Ransom is a Commander Human serving as First Officer aboard USS Cerritos (NCC-75567). Featured among Starfleet’s junior officers handling second‑contact duties.

bio: Shaxs is a Lieutenant Commander Bajoran serving as Chief of Security aboard USS Cerritos (NCC-75567). Featured among Starfleet’s junior officers handling second‑contact duties.

name: T'Ana
bio: T'Ana is a Doctor Caitian serving as Chief Medical Officer aboard USS Cerritos (NCC-75567). Featured among Starfleet’s junior officers handling second‑contact duties.

name: Dal R'El
bio: Runaway who becomes the acting leader of the Protostar kids.

name: Gwyndala
bio: Gwyndala is a Cadet Valtese serving as Crew / Diplomatic aboard USS Protostar (NX-76884). Part of the young crew aboard the experimental USS Protostar.

name: Zero
bio: Zero is a Mediation (Non-corporeal) serving as Crew / Science aboard USS Protostar (NX-76884). Part of the young crew aboard the experimental USS Protostar.

bio: Jankom Pog is a Cadet Tellarite serving as Engineer aboard USS Protostar (NX-76884). Part of the young crew aboard the experimental USS Protostar.

name: Murf
bio: Murf is a Mellanoid slime worm serving as Mascot / Security aboard USS Protostar (NX-76884). Part of the young crew aboard the experimental USS Protostar.

name: Hologram Janeway
bio: Hologram Janeway is a Hologram serving as Training Hologram aboard USS Protostar (NX-76884). Part of the young crew aboard the experimental USS Protostar.
